strings.DGOD_DEATH_MESSAGE: <color=#00FF80>{0}</color> gave everyone <color=#e2b00b>{1} gold</color> from the grave! {2}
strings.DGOD_DEATH_MESSAGE_WITHOUT_QUIP: <color=#00FF80>{0}</color> gave everyone <color=#e2b00b>{1} gold</color> from the grave!
strings.QUIP_1: Don't forget to thank them for dying!
